forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies early, then partly cloudy this afternoon. High near 15C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early, followed by partial clearing. High around 60F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday
